name: CXL3_XS_FUNC_SECURE_MEM_CHECK
summary: Establish the DMR simics and boot up TD and used NUMA node2 CXL memory as example by command:numactl --membind=2 ./boot_vm.sh, check the NUMA CXL memory is used by the target TD
steps: Step 2: Boot up TD and used NUMA node2 as CXL memory as example by command:numactl --membind=2 ./boot_vm.sh
